mapper.insert: insert schedule (user_id, date, start_hour, start_minute, end_hour, end_minute, schedule_text, schedule_state) values(#{user_id},#{date},#{start_hour},#{start_minute},#{end_hour},#{end_minute},#{schedule_text},#{schedule_state})
mapper.select: select * from schedule join user on user.user_id=schedule.user_id where username=#{username};
